Package sketch.compiler.passes.lowering

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddArraySizeAssertions  
    AddInitializers  
    AddLastAssignmentToFork  
    AddPkgNameToNames  
    AssembleInitializers
    Pair up variable declarations and adjacent assignments.
    AtomizeStatements
    Each statement within a parallel section is decomposed into atomic substatements.
    BackendCleanup
    Cleans up the code before output.
    BlockifyRewriteableStmts
    Prepares an AST for later rewrite steps that might turn a single statement into multiple ones.
    BoundUnboundedLoops
    Converts unbounded 'for', 'while', and 'do-while' loops into a bounded form.
    CollectFunCallsToCombine
    Collects mutually exclusive function calls that are on different branches of if-else and switch statements.
    CollectGlobalTags  
    CollectStmtTags  
    ConstantReplacer
    Takes numeric constants defined at the beginning of the program and inlines their definition throughout the program.
    ConstantReplacer.GetValDefs
    Find all the global variables that remain constant through the computation.
    ConvertVoidReturnTypesToBit
    Convert functions that return type 'void' to ones that return type 'bit'.
    DisambiguateUnaries
    Give a rigid ordering to operations such as ++, --.
    EliminateArrayDims
    Nullify the "dims" property in any array type
    EliminateArrayRange
    This class isolates array range reads and writes so that expressions of the form arr[a::b] = complicated become tmp = complicated; arr[a::b] = tmp; Also, things like arr = fun_of(x[a::b]); become tmp = x[a::b]; arr = func_of(tmp); This way, assignments to array ranges can assume that the rhs is simply an arrya variable of the same size, and binary expressions, etc, can assume they have no array ranges.
    EliminateBitSelector  
    EliminateComplexForLoops  
    EliminateConditionals  
    EliminateFinalStructs  
    EliminateGenerics  
    EliminateHugeArrays  
    EliminateImmutableStructs
    This class replaces immutable structs with tuples.
    EliminateInsertBlocks
    Lowers 'insert' blocks as follows: insert S into { s0; s1; s2; ...; sn; } ==> int where = ??; assert 0 <= where <= n+1; if (0 == where) S; s1; if (1 == where) S; s2 ...
    EliminateLockUnlock  
    EliminateMDCopies  
    EliminateMultiDimArrays
    Rewrites array types and array accesses so that we are left with one-dimensional arrays only.
    EliminateNestedArrAcc  
    EliminateNestedTupleReads  
    EliminateNestedTuples  
    EliminateRegens  
    EliminateReorderBlocks
    Replaces the Anyorder nodes with basic integer holes.
    EliminateReturns  
    EliminateStructs
    Does four things: (1) Replaces 'new [struct]()' expressions with pointers into [struct] arrays (2) Converts variables of type [struct] into ints (3) Replaces field accesses with indexes into field arrays (4) Replaces null with the constant -1.
    EliminateUnboxedStructs  
    EliminateZeroArrays  
    ExprTools
    A toolbox of queries about properties of expressions.
    ExtractComplexFunParams  
    ExtractComplexLoopConditions  
    ExtractRightShifts
    Actually, this extracts both right shifts and left shifts.
    ExtractVectorsInCasts  
    FindFreeVariables
    Front-end visitor pass to find free variables in anonymous streams.
    FlattenStmtBlocks
    Gets rid of nested and empty blocks.
    FunctionParamExtension
    Converts function that return something to functions that take extra output parameters.
    GetExprType
    Visitor that returns the type of an expression.
    GetUsedStructs
    Get the struct names used by each function.
    GlobalsToParams
    convert global variables to inout parameters, with a static initializer function.
    GlobalsToParams.FcnToParamsMap  
    HoistDeclarations
    Hoists declarations to the beginning of their enclosing scope.
    LoopInvariantAssertionHoisting  
    LowerLoopsToWhileLoops
    As the name says, convert all loops into while loops.
    MakeAllocsAtomic
    This pass is very simple: it wraps allocations in atomic { } blocks.
    MakeBodiesBlocks
    Front-end visitor pass to replace the bodies of compound statements with blocks.
    MakeLoopsRecursive  
    MakeMultiDimExplicit  
    MergeADT
    This class merges different variants of an ADT into one combined version with field "type" to distinguish between different variants.
    MergeLocalStatements
    Converts runs of statements with only local effects, plus at most statement with global effects, into a single atomic block.
    NumberStatements
    The purpose of this class is to number all the statements in the program.
    OptimizeADT  
    ProtectDangerousExprsAndShortCircuit
    Protect dangerous expressions such as array accesses, division and dereferences.
    ReinterpretAssumes  
    RenameBitVars
    Front-end visitor passes that renames variables of type bit to have "_bit_" on the front of their names.
    ReplaceImplicitVarDecl
    replace implicit variable declarations by explicit ones
    ReplaceSketchesWithSpecs  
    ScrubStructType  
    SemanticChecker
    Perform checks on the semantic correctness of a StreamIt program.
    SeparateInitializers
    Separate variable initializers into separate statements.
    SimpleLoopUnroller  
    SymbolTableVisitor
    Front-end visitor pass that maintains a symbol table.
    SymbolTableVisitor.TypeRenamer  
    TrimDumbDeadCode
    Remove expression statements with no side effects.
    UnrollLocalLoops  
    VariableDeclarationMover
    Collects all variable declarations from a function (except for loop vars) and moves them to the top of that function.
    VariableDisambiguator
    Visits the code looking for duplicate variables in different scopes of the same function.
